description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Athens, Greece. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Athens Airport Luxury with Spa, Pool & Multiple Onsite Restaurants
hotels.description: Perfectly positioned for a smooth layover, this luxury Sofitel hotel is conveniently located within the terminal of Athens Airport and a short drive from the vibrant city centre. Between flights savour contemporary Greek cuisine at the stylish Mesoghaia Restaurant or planespot with a cocktail in hand from Jenny's Rooftop Restaurant. Keep active in the well-equipped fitness centre, swim laps of the pool or explore attractions including the historic Acropolis, Parthenon or the storied Panathenaic Stadium.

hotels.title: Contemporary Athens Stay Close to Airport with Cosy Restaurant & Indoor Pool
hotels.description: If you’re looking for an incredibly comfortable and well-appointed stay just a stone’s throw from Athens Airport, Holiday Inn Athens - Airport, an IHG Hotel, is the ideal destination for guests exploring the vibrant city or just passing through. Traverse around the ancient city your way and return to splash in the indoor pool, or to indulge in a hearty serving of moussaka at Ruby Restaurant, or head to the gilded and opulent Golden Bar for dessert and a nightcap.

hotels.title: Athens City Centre Retreat with Rooftop Sundeck and Pool
hotels.description: Discover contemporary and classic Greece in convenience and comfort from the urban oasis that is Crowne Plaza Athens - City Centre, an IHG Hotel. Journey back in time, with the iconic Acropolis and Parthenon a short drive away. Dine on delectable Greek gastronomy at Ambrosia restaurant or bask in the Mediterranean sun by the pool and rooftop sun deck. When you're done exploring the best of Athens, soothe tired muscles at the onsite sauna.

hotels.title: Luxurious Central Athens Elegance Overlooking the Acropolis with Three Onsite Eateries
hotels.description: Discover Athens' historic heart with a stay at this timeless retreat, nestled in the heart of the city. Overlooking Syntagma Square, NJV Athens Plaza Hotel offers a front-row seat to iconic landmarks like the Acropolis, the bustling Plaka district and the chic boutiques of Ermou Street. Inside, expect unparalleled hospitality and sophisticated rooms and suites featuring marbled bathrooms and sweeping views of this storied city. Enjoy a casual bite at the Plaza Café, indulge in Mediterranean cuisine crafted with fresh, local ingredients at the stylish Parliament Restaurant and wind down at the end of each day with a drink at Explorer's Bar Bistro.

hotels.vendor_name: The Dolli at Acropolis, A Hotel to Live
hotels.title: Downtown Athens Boutique Haven with Infinity Pool & Rooftop Terrace
hotels.description: Once the grand Kallimasiotis Mansion in 1925, this historic gem has had quite the journey, morphing into a luxury fabric store before blossoming into the boutique hotel you see today, a glow-up that would make even Aphrodite jealous. The redesign has embraced the building's rich history while giving it a fresh twist, making it the ultimate hangout for your Athens getaway. Step inside and soak up the Athenian vibe. Relax in the numerous peaceful nooks and crannies, or take a dip in the infinity pool that creates the mesmerising illusion of swimming through the columns of the Parthenon. When it's time to indulge, ascend to Dolli's Rooftop Restaurant to satisfy your senses with everything from sushi, meat and fish. Venture outside and find yourself immersed in a vibrant tapestry of ancient wonders and modern delights. With the Acropolis, Ancient Agora and countless other historical treasures just moments away, prepare to let this magical city sweep you off your feet. Lose yourself in Plaka's charming streets, discover hidden courtyards, and create memories that will last a lifetime.

hotels.title: Luxe Central Athens Escape with Rooftop Pool & Panoramic Acropolis Views
hotels.description: Soak up the very best of Greece's storied capital, Athens, with a glorious stay at St. George Lycabettus Lifestyle Hotel - boasting panoramic views of the Acropolis and ranked within the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor. From the moment of arrival, you'll immediately be charmed by this unique property. The interior pays homage to Athens’ neoclassical era while expertly balanced with striking, eye-catching modern design features. The hotel has its own art gallery, cinema, state-of-the-art gym, yoga and pilates studio, plus a rooftop pool with expansive city views. When the time calls for a retail fix, you're just a short walk away from Kolonaki’s endless restaurants, intriguing art galleries, museums, and alluring shops.

hotels.vendor_name: NEW Hotel, a Member of Design Hotels
hotels.title: Five-Star Designer Athens Escape with Acropolis-View Rooftop Bar
hotels.description: Get your dose of Greece's ancient culture while enjoying cutting-edge design with a five-star stay at NEW Hotel in Athens. This avant-garde boutique hotel might be housed in a 1950s building, but the interior showcases forward-thinking touches from Brazilian designers Fernando and Humberto Campana. Take time to peruse the onsite art gallery, visit the library (home to over 2,000 books), luxuriate at NEW Sense Spa and see Athens from above at the stylish rooftop Art Lounge, boasting Acropolis views. When you’re feeling ready to explore, the charms of Athens are just a short stroll from your lavish hotel room.

hotels.title: Contemporary-Cool Athens Escape near the Acropolis with Rooftop Terrace
hotels.description: Transforming the once historic Canadian Embassy into a sanctuary of contemporary Nordic design, The Modernist Athens celebrates mid-century minimalism and Danish design principles in the capital of Classic style. Nestled on a quiet street overlooking a leafy square, its rooftop showcases sweeping views from the Acropolis to the Mediterranean. Located in the upscale Kolonaki neighbourhood, you're steps away from iconic attractions and world-class museums such as the Benaki and the Museum of Cycladic Art, and nearby sophisticated shopping districts like Voukourestiou Street and Ermou invite you to immerse yourself in Athens' dynamic rhythm.

hotels.title: Stylish Athens Escape with Acropolis Views & Rooftop Bar
hotels.description: The wonders of Ancient Greece are at your fingertips when you stay at InterContinental Athenaeum Athens, an IHG Hotel, where contemporary design meets the crumbling remains of the Acropolis. When you're not out there exploring UNESCO World Heritage-listed sites, head up to Premiere, a rooftop restaurant and bar with spectacular views of the Acropolis, then venture to the poolside Cafezoe Terrace for cocktails and desserts.
